name: Paratrooper Pack
detailed_description:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic paratroopers units from 1940



No subscription is required to purchase or play this content. This is a one time purchase pack.

Join the AIRBORNE and jump out of a perfectly good air plane! Paratrooper operations are one of the most fun and unique game play elements of WWII Online. This DLC gives you access to the essentials to be a paratrooper and fly others to battle!

  • British C-47 Transport Plane
  • Airborne Rifleman (Enfield)
  • Airborne SMG (M1928 Thompson)
  • Airborne Light Mortarman (Enfield + Mortar)
  • French Ju-52 Transport Plane
  • Airborne Rifleman (Mas36)
  • Airborne SMG (Mas38)
  • Airborne Light Mortarman (Lebel + Mortar)
  • German Ju-52 Transport Plane
  • Airborne Rifleman (Kar98)
  • Airborne SMG (MP40)
  • Airborne Light Mortarman (Kar98 + Mortar)

short_description: Join the AIRBORNE and jump out of a perfectly good air plane! Paratrooper operations are one of the most fun and unique game play elements of WWII Online. This DLC gives you access to the essentials to be a paratrooper and fly others to battle!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
